name: Potatoes with Whole Indian Spices. Vegan Gluten Free.
description: Potatoes with whole Indian spices. A delicious and easy side dish for any day of the week. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon red chili flakes or chopped green chili to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium deep pan, add the oil and heat on medium heat for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium deep pan, add the oil and heat on medium heat for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mustard seeds and let them start to sputter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mustard seeds and let them start to sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the fennel and coriander seeds and mix well for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the fennel and coriander seeds and mix well for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic and chili and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic and chili and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes, turmeric and salt and mix well to coat spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes, turmeric and salt and mix well to coat spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook covered for 10 minutes on medium heat. Degalze the pan if the potatoes stick with a Tbsp of water. Lower the heat and cook covered for another 10 or more minutes until potatoes are tender. Stir once in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook covered for 10 minutes on medium heat. Degalze the pan if the potatoes stick with a Tbsp of water. Lower the heat and cook covered for another 10 or more minutes until potatoes are tender. Stir once in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro leaves! Serve as part of meal with any lentil curry(Daal), or beans curry, or other soups/stews, Indian flat bread(Roti) and salad or any indian pickle.(my current favorite is the punjabi raw mango pickle) Happy Potato day!
